mapper.insert: insert into reservation_alarm (reservation_id, type, schedule_time) values (#{reservationId}, #{reservationAlarmType}, #{scheduleTime})
mapper.select: select ra.RESERVATION_ALARM_ID, r.restaurant_id, r.member_id, ra.TYPE as RESERVATION_ALARM_TYPE, r.time as RESERVATION_TIME from reservation_alarm ra left join reservation r on r.reservation_id = ra.reservation_id where ra.schedule_time >= now();
